dct_title_s: Mapa de la Repu´blica de Bolivia
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Includes tables showing population of cities and districts and altitudes of major mountains, notes, 4 indexed inset maps and ill. "Mandado publicar pr. el gobierno de la nación en la administración del presidente Doctor José Maria Linares y secretario de instrucción pública Doctor Lucas Mendoza de la Tapial." Originally one map on 4 sheets, each sheet 81 x 60 cm. or smaller. Historic Maps copy is signed by Juan Ondarza and Juan Maro. Mujia.
dct_publisher_sm: N[ew] Y[ork], E[stados] U[nidos] : J.H. Colton, 1859.
